divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my friend were drinking in the woods outside his house when we heard ahumming noise. I looked up and saw a saucer like object heading towards us. Itstopped hovering over a cow in the middle of the field. It stayed there hoveringfor a while when a beam of light came out of the UFO. My friend Bobby passed outat this point. I watch as the cow was lifted into the ship and flown off. Ibegan to vomit. I watched as it dissapreared into the sky. Then I blacked out.In the morning I went back to the site and all I found was the head of the cowand its hoves.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Cornish
This sighting has never been favorited.
